tool.command: #import time #set non_ready_states = ['new', 'queued', 'running', 'setting_metadata', 'upload'] #while $input.dataset.state in $non_ready_states: time.sleep(60) #end while #set history_id = $__app__.security.encode_id($input.history.id) #set history_name = $input.history.name python $__tool_directory__/bigwig_dataset_output_stats.py --config_file $__tool_directory__/stats_config.ini --input "$input" --input_id "$__app__.security.encode_id($input.id)" --input_datatype "$input.ext" --dbkey "$input.metadata.dbkey" --history_id "$history_id" --history_name "$history_name" --stats_tool_id "bigwig_dataset_forward_output_stats" --tool_id "forward_bigwig" --user_email "$__user_email__" --output "$payload"
tool.help:
**What it does**
Generates statistics on the BigWig(Forward) dataset in the **CEGR Galaxy ChIP-exo** pipeline.
A JSON dictionary containing the run, sample and genome reference is sent via a POST to the PEGR REST API where the information is stored to support the CEGR ChIP-exo statistics reports.
